chart.description: Error rate on requests made to the endpoint
chart.name: Error rate
chart.programText:
A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_error', 'false') and filter('sf_operation', '*'), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*'), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*(B-A)/B).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Request rate
chart.programText: A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*'), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='A')

chart.description: Distribution of service response time with median (p50), 90th and 99th percentiles
chart.name: Request Latency distribution
chart.programText:
A = data('service.request.duration.ns.median', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*')).max(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service']).publish(label='A')
B = data('service.request.duration.ns.p90', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*')).max(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service']).publish(label='B')
C = data('service.request.duration.ns.p99', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*')).max(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service']).publish(label='C')

chart.description: 99th percentile response time by endpoint of the service
chart.name: Request Latency (p99) by endpoint
chart.programText: C = data('spans.duration.ns.p99', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*'))).max(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Error rate on requests made to the service
chart.name: Error rate
chart.programText:
A = data('service.request.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_error', 'false'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('service.request.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*(B-A)/B).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Error rate on requests made to the endpoint
chart.name: Error rate
chart.programText:
A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_error', 'false') and filter('sf_operation', '*'), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*'), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*(B-A)/B).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Requests/sec processed by each endpoint of the service
chart.name: Request rate by endpoint
chart.programText: A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Request Latency (p99)
chart.programText: A = data('spans.duration.ns.p99', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*')).max(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Request rate
chart.programText: A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*'), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='A')

chart.description: Error rate on requests made to endpoints of the service
chart.name: Error rate by endpoint
chart.programText:
A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_error', 'false'), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*(B-A)/B).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Distribution of endpoint response time with median (p50), 90th and 99th percentiles
chart.name: Request Latency distribution
chart.programText:
A = data('spans.duration.ns.median', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*')).max(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='A')
B = data('spans.duration.ns.p90', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*')).max(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='B')
C = data('spans.duration.ns.p99', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*')).max(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Most erroneous service endpoints (1-minute error rate average)
chart.name: Top endpoints by error rate
chart.programText:
A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_error', 'false'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')), rollup='delta').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*(B-A)/B).mean(over='1m').top(count=10).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Most active service endpoints (1-minute requests/sec average)
chart.name: Top endpoints by request rate
chart.programText: A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service', 'sf_operation']).mean(over='1m').top(count=10).publish(label='A')

chart.description: Error rate on requests made to the service
chart.name: Error rate
chart.programText:
A = data('service.request.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_error', 'false'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('service.request.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['sf_environment', 'sf_service']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*(B-A)/B).publish(label='C')
